message: Let's start fair. I'll take a bigger share, but you still get something.
You took 90% in the first round, I'll take 75% this time. Your turn to make a better offer!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, a fairer deal than your last offer.
You offered 60/40, I'll counter with 55/45. You're getting closer to the 60% you wanted, but I'm not giving up yet!
